verses.text: \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* entrance \w in|strong="G1529"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* it \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* in \w vain|strong="G2756"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* after that we had suffered \w before|strong="G4310"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were shamefully \w entreated|strong="G5195"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Philippi|strong="G5375"\w*, we were \w bold|strong="G3955"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w contention|strong="G0073"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w exhortation|strong="G3874"\w* \add was\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w deceit|strong="G4106"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w guile|strong="G1388"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* we were \w allowed|strong="G1381"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* to be put in trust \w with|strong="G4100"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, even \w so|strong="G3779"\w* we \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w pleasing|strong="G0700"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w trieth|strong="G1381"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* at any \w time|strong="G4218"\w* used \w we|strong="G1096"\w* \w flattering|strong="G2850"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* a \w cloke|strong="G4392"\w* of \w covetousness|strong="G4124"\w*; \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w witness|strong="G3144"\w*:

\w Nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* sought \w we|strong="G2212"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \add yet\add* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w others|strong="G0243"\w*, when we \w might|strong="G1410"\w* have \w been|strong="G1511"\w* \w burden|strong="G0922"\w*\w some|strong="G1722"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* we \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w gentle|strong="G2261"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w even|strong="G0302"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w nurse|strong="G5162"\w* \w cherisheth|strong="G2282"\w* \w her|strong="G1438"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*:

\w So|strong="G3779"\w* being affectionately \w desirous|strong="G2442"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, we were \w willing|strong="G2106"\w* to have \w imparted|strong="G3330"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* our \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*, \w because|strong="G1360"\w* ye \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w dear|strong="G0027"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w remember|strong="G3421"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w labour|strong="G2873"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w travail|strong="G3449"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w labouring|strong="G2038"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w because|strong="G4314"\w* we \w would|strong="G1912"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be chargeable \w unto|strong="G1912"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, we \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Ye|strong="G5210"\w* \add are\add* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add also\add*, \w how|strong="G5613"\w* \w holily|strong="G3743"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w justly|strong="G1346"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unblameably|strong="G0274"\w* we behaved \w ourselves|strong="G1096"\w* among \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*:

\w As|strong="G2509"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w how|strong="G5613"\w* we \w exhorted|strong="G3870"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w comforted|strong="G3888"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w charged|strong="G3140"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \add doth\add* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*,

\w That|strong="G1519"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* would \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0516"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1223"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w cause|strong="G1223"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w thank|strong="G2168"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* without \w ceasing|strong="G0089"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w*, when ye \w received|strong="G3880"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* which ye \w heard|strong="G0189"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, ye \w received|strong="G1209"\w* \add it\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \add as\add* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* in \w truth|strong="G0230"\w*, the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* effectually \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w followers|strong="G3402"\w* of the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w* \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* have \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* like \w things|strong="G5024"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* your \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w countrymen|strong="G4853"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \add have\add* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w killed|strong="G0615"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* their \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have \w persecuted|strong="G1559"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w please|strong="G0700"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* are \w contrary|strong="G1727"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*:

\w Forbidding|strong="G2967"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* to the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* fill \w up|strong="G0378"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w alway|strong="G3842"\w*: \w for|strong="G1161"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* is \w come|strong="G5348"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w uttermost|strong="G5056"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, being \w taken|strong="G0642"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* a \w short|strong="G5610"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* in \w presence|strong="G4383"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* in \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w endeavoured|strong="G4704"\w* the more \w abundantly|strong="G4056"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w desire|strong="G1939"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* we would \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w even|strong="G3303"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w once|strong="G0530"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G1364"\w*; \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* \w hindered|strong="G1465"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* of \w rejoicing|strong="G2746"\w*? \add Are\add* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* in the presence \w of|strong="G1715"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w*?
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*.
